content.text:
# RANCID (software)

RANCID (Really Awesome New Cisco Config Differ) is a network management application released under a BSD-style license.
RANCID uses Expect to connect to the routers, send some commands and put the results in files.
Software which utilises RANCID-collected configs
*[https://www.librenms.org/ LibreNMS]
*[https://www.observium.org/ Observium]
*[https://www.opennms.com/ OpenNMS]
See also
*Network management system (NMS)
*Console Server
*Router
*Switch
References
* Shrubbery Networks, Inc. [http://www.shrubbery.net/rancid/ RANCID]
External links
* Website of RANCID: [http://shrubbery.net/rancid/RANCID - Really Awesome New Cisco confIg Differ]
* Joe Abley and Stephen Stuart: Internet Software Consortium
* Peter Harrison: [http://www.linuxhomenetworking.com/whitepapers/2/rancid.htm Network Device Backups with Rancid] at linuxhomenetworking.com
